name: viewoverallscreeningresult
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool cleardil.
Tool description: The End-to-End KYC compliance solution An integrated platform to effortlessly meet all your Anti-Money Laundering and KYC requirements - on the back of a modern Web Portal and a developer-friendly API.
API description: Fetches the overall screening result for a given customer and screening ID from the ClearDIL API.

authorization.description: Authorization token required for the API request.

content_type.description: The content type for the API request, typically 'application/json'.

customer_a_id.description: The customer ID for whom the screening result is being fetched.

screening_a_id.description: The screening ID whose result is being requested.
